description: Add CLI availability health check at coderef-context server startup. Verify @coderef/core CLI exists and is executable. Fail fast with clear error message if unavailable. Enable graceful degradation mode.

context.impact: High - Eliminates single point of failure risk
context.blocking_issue: If @coderef/core CLI unavailable, entire coderef-context fails with generic error. No way to know if CLI exists before first tool call.
